name: C.S Herschal - A Lost Ship
description:
A hulking chunk of gray metal lingers motionlessly in the dark abyss, a void in the eternal black that surrounds it. “C.S Herschal” carved into the side. It’s too early to tell whether it was luck or ill-fate that drew you to her crumbling side—but one thing is for sure—you’ll soon be a part of whatever story she holds.

C.S Herschal - A Lost Ship

A brochure sized, one-shot module designed for Mothership.

The C.S Herschal is a derelict vessel floating through the void of space. The crew are dead, the ship is infested with a horde of hostile creatures, and its Hull and Support systems are barely clinging to life. But, with a cargo bay filled with valuable goods, is the danger worth the risk.

The module contains:

  • A 20 room ship to explore
  • A new monster, the Triturating Araneae, a vicious space arachnid
  • Ship Maps, plus alternative stylistic versions
  • Rollable loot tables
  • A destruction-time based system to add an escalating tension to the game
